metadata.description: Additional information related to the campaign.

id.description: The ID associated with the metadata.

name.description: The name associated with the metadata.

code.description: The code associated with the metadata.

metrics.description: Various performance metrics for the campaign.

impressions.description: The total number of times the campaign was displayed.

clicks.description: The total number of clicks received.

totalConversions.description: The total number of conversions for the campaign.

conversions.description: The total number of conversions recorded.

viewConversions.description: The total number of conversions from views.

spend.description: The total amount spent on the campaign.

ctr.description: The click-through rate of the campaign.

conversionRate.description: The rate at which clicks lead to conversions.

viewConversionRate.description: The conversion rate specifically for views.

cpa.description: The cost per acquisition for the campaign.

totalCpa.description: The total cost per acquisition for the campaign.

totalSumValue.description: The total sum value of the specified metric.

sumValue.description: The sum value of a specified metric.

viewSumValue.description: The sum value of the view metric.

totalAverageValue.description: The overall average value for the campaign.

averageValue.description: The average value of a specified metric.

viewAverageValue.description: The average value of the view metric.

totalRoas.description: The total return on ad spend for the campaign.

roas.description: The return on ad spend for the campaign.

videoReachedFirstQ.description: The number of video content that reached the first quartile.

videoReachedSecondQ.description: The number of video content that reached the second quartile.

videoReachedThirdQ.description: The number of video content that reached the third quartile.

videoReachedCompletion.description: The number of video content that reached completion.

videoViewDuration.description: The total view duration for video content.

videoAvgViewDuration.description: The average view duration for video content.

videoPlays.description: The total number of video plays.

clicksOnVideo.description: The number of clicks specifically on video content.

videoActiveCompletions.description: The number of active completions for video content.

videoActiveCompletionsPercentage.description: The percentage of active completions for video content.

marketer_id.description: The unique identifier for the marketer associated with the campaign.

campaign_id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.
